b'I usually back \'em on KS or buy new, but "ooh, a TMG game I don\'t already have, & cheap!" \xe2\x80\xa6was sad it was unplayable, now more loyal to TMG.'
b"Kudos to @TastyMinstrel ! I bought 1 of their games used & it was missing a component\xe2\x80\x94they're sending me a replacement. Very gracious."
b"@fairway3games I could actually go fix it in PS myself, but can't be the only artist with a long name. https://t.co/9Jc2z6mts4"
b'@fairway3games It\'s not a huge deal; I\'m dropping the "III" for now, though that\'s my father\'s name, who is also an artist, but not 2D. ;)'
b'@fairway3games I\'m working on making some cards from my own paintings, but my full name doesn\'t fit in portrait. :/ "Teel McClanahan III"'
b"But ugh, $50? What does it think it is, a board game? It isn't as though I'll play it with other people, or more than once\xe2\x80\xa6"
b'Or, if I hurry, I can get DS3 for under $50 from Amazon Prime, or even the Day One edition for that price from Prime Now (w/coupon code).'
b'\xe2\x80\xa6or I could wait 2-3 years for the price to drop to that range, and/or buy DS2 now for ~$25-$30. I feel like game prices used to drop more.'
b"I'm trying to decide how much I want to spend on Dark Souls (probably 3). I can keep Redboxing it, but project it'll be >$22 minimum\xe2\x80\xa6"
b'"Cubes. I hope you love them because you\'re going to be pushing them around until the end of human civilization." Sold! #ThroughTheAges'
b'Setting up "Hey Siri" on new iPad w/ iPhone nearby: Silly.\n\nAlso: It should detect I\'m following the setup prompts & comment on new device.'
b'Unboxing my new 9.7" iPad Pro; very happy to see: There\'s no wobble. It has the camera bump, but somehow lies flat on the table. Very nice!'
b'@Racheldoesstuff You were charming on @colbertlateshow, but now I have to ask: Where can I get that dress? My wife saw it & fell in love.'
b"@Beq I know, & possibly they're minimizing re-shipping; I know most of my system orders come straight from China\xe2\x80\x94suppose they're all direct?"
b"@HyperboleGrant I uhh.. I got 1 on Social, 2 on Thematic, 9 on Wargamer, & 76 on Euros. I think their idea of 'thematic' differs from mine."
b'The iPad, of course, is set for delivery Thursday.\n\nThey sure are focused on environmental issues!'
b'Apple is silly. I ordered: iPad Pro, Pencil, & Smart Cover, all in 1 order with free shipping. Pencil will arrive tomorrow, cover Monday.'
b'@boardgameduel The BGG ratings system also measures "how much you want to play" rather than an objective/universal "how good is this game".'
b'@mikerugnetta To not retroactively cease to exist, never having created the things I enjoy. That would be a bummer. If I were aware of it.'
b"Luckily, the new iPad Pro does not appear to be in too high demand\xe2\x80\x94I'm still getting 3/31 delivery. Possibly because I can't afford >32Gb."
b'Gosh, the internet is distracting. Just now remembered I jumped out of bed to run & pre-order my new iPad... two and a half hours ago.'
b"Was up late last night writing/thinking so hard about election stats I forgot to pre-order the new iPad. Guess I'd better go do that."
b'Marked as to-read: Not on Fire, but Burning by Greg Hrbek https://t.co/WVdWxffK1G'
b'@TastyMinstrel Martian Dice is another that, while not a favorite, hits the table a lot\xe2\x80\x94both as filler/opener & w/new players.Easy to teach.'
b"@TastyMinstrel I try not to break it out until near the end of the night. Or leave it home if it's been taking over too much."

b'Spent $3500 this morning (half of cash pmt, 1/3 of total, for new HVAC/system) and my stomach is doing flips.

So much depends
upon

money.'
b'@TastyMinstrel Most played: Codenames; fast & repeatable. My favorites (Paperback, EmDo, Dungeon Petz) are longer/heavier. Overlap=Betrayal.'
b"Oh, ouch, and the bump to 128Gb is $150, too.\n\nDouble-checked my math; I'm $170 short of 32Gb Wifi +cover +Pencil +tax. No new keyboard."
b'$100 price increase for the min spec means I can only *consider* the Pencil\xe2\x80\x94which is my primary justification for the upgrade. >32Gb is out.'
b'I was hoping the updated iPads would be at yesterday\'s iPad Air prices, so I could "splurge" on the Pencil and *consider* the capacity bump.'
b'Where by "wait a bit", I mean I\'m still using an iPad (3rd gen) I got the day it launched; I\'ve already been waiting more than a bit.'
b'A little sad that the iPad update is a price increase. Couple hundred more than I have saved, including the Pencil. May have to wait a bit.'
b'Someday, I may even attempt to use the Magician Powers, too. But only ever with players who already knew the game, for sure.'
b'Finally played Trickerion 4p. Experienced gamers, so I taught w/Dark Alley for their 1st game. Went over great. So fun/frustrating/amazing.'
b'Must... stand up... Back away from the computer...\n\nPeople coming over to play boardgames today, and I have to vacuum the house, et cetera.'
b'Today: 10 Cloverfield Lane; was very interested by trailers, but the more I see reviewers/stars keeping secrets, the less I want to see it.'
b'Burned too many times by things where the anticipation/"Surprise!", not the content, was the only part close to great. e.g.: Pandemic Legacy'
b'My attitude toward spoilers seems to be shifting. I\'m losing my ability to buy into the whole "x thing is great, but we won\'t tell you why."'
b'Marked as to-read: The High Mountains of Portugal by Yann Martel https://t.co/pKmBxck92t'
b'And yes, I mostly just come to twitter to talk to myself.'
b"Realistically, I'll talk to my wife about it; it's largely about discretion & consideration (not seeding arguments), not hiding something."
b"Now here I am on Twitter, and I won't mention which news item it was.\n\nI guess I may have found a secret; I thought I didn't have any."
b"Couldn't get myself to send a txt about it to a friend, or post a friends-only post, or even post into a private & accepting group."
b"Glerck. Just spent half an hour starting to write (& then deleting) anything about a news item I'm excited by, afraid of people's reactions."
b"Fun fact: If your *tutorial* level doesn't show me that your game is fun, there's a good chance I'll delete without reaching the game."
b"@mikerugnetta In a way; it's becoming more like the rest of life.\n\nWant the old [excellent] internet experience? You need more curation."
b'@Bee2Inc I worked out the old heat pump used ~15.5Mw in last year; if all goes well the new system will pull <10Mw/yr & be more comfortable.'
b"@Bee2Inc Somewhat, yes. In the city the lows don't drop below ~90\xc2\xb0 for about a month every summer. Highs often over 115\xc2\xb0 for weeks."
b"@Bee2Inc We have fans in every room. Avg highs all July >108\xc2\xb0 in Phx; hit the 90's inside our house with (old, dying) AC running 24/7 in '15"
b'(i.e.: When we know everything is working as it should, and the house is more comfortable, and the bills are lower.)'
b"Picked an HVAC installer. Emailed them to let them know. Yes, the expensive but fully-formed proposal. Still stressed; probably 'til summer."
b"Ugh, & starting this year (with AT&T no longer subsidizing) we'll [probably] no longer be getting the latest iPhone at launch every year. :("
b'Meanwhile, life should be more bearable. Savings knocked out, but rebuildable. Bills less stressful. Hosting game nights more comfortable.'
b'If my projections are anywhere near correct, power savings will more than cover minimum rate to pay it off before interest accrues.'
b"I hate to do it, having worked so hard to pay off cc's, but I think I'm going to opt for the expensive A/C overhaul & put ~$4k on credit."
b"Listening to the first single from @jherekbischoff's Cistern; chilling, enveloping. I can't wait to write a novel to this album on repeat."
b'Bite down on that bullet.\nBite it.'
b'Walmart just emailed to ask me to rate/review a gallon of milk.\n\nNo.'
b'Shoot. I often do that. wrong sign. I meant >$10k, not <$10k. Around $10,700.'
b'...so I have to decide assuming efficiency will only be affected by the new unit, in case it is, & is improved comfort/airflow worth $4-5k?'
b"I have $6-7k saved toward the project, but it's impossible to really know the impact to efficiency of new ducts/insulation until it's done."
b'Do I spend $5k for just-a-new-heat-pump or spend <$10k for heat pump, new (properly designed & sealed) ducts, and thorough insulation?'
b"Trying to decide whether headache is related to drug change or just because I'm still dealing with getting A/C estimates."
b"Tried halving my new(-ish) drug regimen for the first time today, since it's so expensive (and works for some at lower dose); have headache."
b'There sure are an awful lot of comic books to read.'
b'System/installation, maintenance, electricity, rising costs after warranty & before next replacement... Hardly a thought when scraping by.'
b'Not just "what can I afford this minute / in installments", but when amortizing expected lifetime costs of ownership, can we even afford AC?'
b'When poor: A/C was simply "if it blows, we\'re screwed". Now I\'m trying to replace dying unit & pricing based on saving for the next one.'
b'Budgeting is a constant challenge. 2nd quint household income, trying to be responsible; when poorer, we could ignore so many eventualities.'
b'First HVAC guy will be here in minutes; getting 10+ estimates over the next week for a new heat pump; anxious/stressed to the point of numb.'
b"That reminds me to make sure I have some of my (in-budget) automatic recurring payments going through my remaining cc, so there's activity."
b"@rkalajian I paid 'em >$1k in interest in the year before paying it off, and they didn't leave it open 6 months; said I could re-apply."
b'@rkalajian Paid off & closed some, left others open. Had one of those close itself w/o warning for not being used. :('
b'Credit score has been dropping steadily since we paid off our last credit card about a year ago. Steady payments on mortgage & sl. #itsatrap'
b'@eevee What if I told you they *are* colors?: https://t.co/cjRS3SOgXm https://t.co/f99JBHC1rh (Closest I could find. \xf0\x9f\x98\x89)'
b"Or: Feeling okay, but reality is choked with intractable problems & I wish I were dead but I'm not allowed to die but I can't stop thinking."
b"This morning I'm discovering depths of depression my new drug regimen can't entirely reach. Current status: Happy with my existential dread?"
b'RT @RudyHavenstein: The American economy in two headlines. https://t.co/xqOc5S2OiS'
b'@benkutcher @HyperboleGrant @HeavyCardboard Have you considered GALANT? Just picked one up; 17" depth, uninterrupted 30" wide. Fits coffins.'
b"It's remarkable how rapidly I get back up to a sextillion cookies per second after resurrection. Cheating helps."
b"Tonight I discovered that playing 504 with *actual other persons* is much more fun than I'd thought it was after 7 solo (virtual 2p) worlds."
b'On page 165 of 400 of The Three-Body Problem, by Liu Cixin: Ack. One framing sentence her... https://t.co/3CC48cnvg6'
b'On page 141 of 400 of The Three-Body Problem, by Liu Cixin: I think I know what the game ... https://t.co/LwigTFPN2x'
b'55% done with 11/22/63, by Stephen King: Been listening to this a little at a time for a ... https://t.co/UYN6X8ZOWC'
b'@WarWraith Well, once your Legacy says you have at least, say, 10+ Heavenly Chips, you should Ascend and start raising your cookie dragon.'
b'@WarWraith I played when it was new, until I had everything, then faded. Missed a year or more of updates, but was drawn back in by v2.'
b'@WarWraith I ascend, I return, I get more grandmas. And better kittens. Snagged some Kitten Angels last time I was in heaven!'
b'On the other hand, my 367+ grandmas sure do bake me a lot of cookies! Onward and upward, kittens!'
b"...though it's possible I used to get asked, & have forgotten, it not being memorable to simply say no or ask for fair pay & then not work."
b"Always supported advice to creators not to do work for free/exposure/etc. Realized last week how crap my work must be; I don't get asked."
b'Would love to see vehicles with "Stop sign assist" that force people to come to a complete stop.'
b'\xf0\x9f\x93\xb7 Sketch of an articulated doll I saw online. Immediately made me want to practice faces & hands next,... https://t.co/u1xDENXNDm'
b'\xf0\x9f\x93\xb7 Only one sketch today, but I decided to break into the Sharpies I got for Christmas & do this one in... https://t.co/In5TidDhKC'
b'\xf0\x9f\x93\xb7 Couple drawings that are freehand copies of other artists\xe2\x80\x99 drawings, and a drawing of Anger from a... https://t.co/sag2Rdk82m'
b'I guess people never stop liking zombies, vampires, and dragons. Or start liking short stories.'
b"Stopped looking at analytics/stats 2+ years ago. Surprised to see some of my Podiobooks are still getting 100's of new listeners/month."
b'@Grizzlysgrowls One can only tell if they also write a bad review. ;) Based on analytics, I think the down voters quit w/in an episode or 2.'
b"[This is part of why I don't feel confident sharing my work with the world, any more. What I like about my work is not what others enjoy.]"
b'Noticed there are up/downvotes on Podiobook pages now; my favorite of my books is my most-downvoted, at 63%, while my worst are marked best.'
b"Engaging with the world is too hard. They don't want to listen, to read closely, to think deeply. Best to stay hidden, silent. Stop asking."
b"So if I can't stomach some of the steps required to disseminate my creations, are they [and I] thus valueless both in thought and in deed?"
b"I created & destroyed 4+ games last year you'll never see or play. Some say ideas are easy & value is in execution; what if never shared?"
b"e.g.: I've got an idea for a new game. Since there's no chance I'll ever bring it to market, is there any reason to develop it fully?"
b'I am trying to decide whether there is a meaningful difference between having an idea and executing [+destroying] it privately.'
b'If I can get myself to accept throwing away & painting over unsold work, I might paint more. Accumulated unwanted work is a stumbling block.'
b"Started taking drugs to reduce my suicidal thoughts; that part's working pretty well, but anxiety can still get through & take over. :("
b"When I peeked out two officers were discussing how to get the handcuffed guy back over the waist-high fence. Thought I'd spare them that."

b'*hears ruckus in back yard*
*peeks out window*
*puts on pants*

Police caught up with a guy in my yard. I let them out the side gate.'
b'\xf0\x9f\x93\xb7 Practicing drawing; last week the Dreamwell boardgame Kickstarter caught my eye & I wanted to try my... https://t.co/0CvJ73mDPY'
b'RT @NevermoreGames: We\xe2\x80\x99re looking for game designs ready to be published. Do you have something we might be interested in? Email us: bryan@\xe2\x80\xa6'
b'Trying to decide if "not being suicidally depressed" is worth $60+/month in drugs, & if so: What will I cut out of the budget to afford it.'
b"Since they aren't pictured, the promos were all 3 promo Dungeon Petz pets, the Mysterium promo, and Prospero + Art Book for Shakespeare."
b"So here's most of what I ordered with that extra $150 last week. 2 new games, 3 expansions, + some promos via BGG. https://t.co/3QjfoOMOaM"
b'Working on a prototype board game design; running genetically enhanced clones around in a maze for science. https://t.co/DNhjb68Tpq'
b"There's something I've never seen before\xe2\x80\x94@MiniMartTalk advertising @TastyMinstrel's Thief's Market Kickstarter in their own marketing email."
b'I keep coming up for designs for games I wouldn\'t want to play. Too much "take that", too much interaction, et cetera. A bit frustrating.'
b'@Bee2Inc Certainly would have been nice. Or more extroverted & good at marketing & networking & community, which works the same way online.'
b'In a universe where I make less than ~$200/year in sales, spending even $30-$40 begins to look outrageous.'
b'Working on a game design, want to order more meeples for the prototype. (Need different sizes of meeples.) P/L statement for 2015 says no.'
b'My real question is: What was it supposed to be for; why all fives?'
b"Cleaning out a desk. Found an envelope containing $95 in $5's which, based on age of surrounding docs, has been there almost 3 years."
b'Not a great year. Almost $300 in expenses, + $125 in COGS. Also wrote down ~$150 owed by a friend who died. Net loss; hard to run lighter.'
b'Going over business numbers for 2015. Looks like I sold <$64 in books, about 2/3 of that eBooks. Almost $150 in card games. No art sales.'
b'One may be better off putting $1-$2 into scratchers for every $1 put into improving/marketing their book; get a better payout, anyway.'
b"Occurred to me today that the odds & payouts for indie authors' financial success and lottery scratchers are about the same."
b'That was weird. Just got stopped on the street by a random stranger asking for business advice\xe2\x80\x94and I actually knew the answers he needed.'
b"(Excited to be working on such an interesting idea. Trying not to think about the fact that the majority of my prototypes just aren't fun.)"
b"I'm getting lightheaded from intense game design. Making excellent progress. Only a few hours from beginning work on Prototype v0.1."
b"3AM is an excellent time to discover your podcast feed is broken. I've fixed it, but wondering how long it's been offline & why no one said."
b'Shoot, they just dropped the price on the other one, too. Keep sweetening that pot, MM! Love the price drop notifications.'
b'Really the ideas for it have been gradually coalescing over weeks, but today was clarity\xe2\x80\x94and a theme appeared, fully formed.'
b'I remain somewhat obsessed with board games despite my dwindling ability to play them with other people. Designing another new one today.'
b'Like, that $150 could go toward my "slowly saving for some sort of VR setup" fund. Current ETA: 2020. Could start bumping it up.'
b'*OR* I could be responsible & not blow the full amount on board games. Decisions, decisions.'
